name: LouisianaPoliceScanner
0:
”Alexa, open Louisiana Police Scanner”
”Alexa, open Louisiana Police Scanner and search for zip code 70114.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: louisiana police scanner
des:
Listen to LIVE police, fire, EMS, railroad and airport scanner feeds in Louisiana. 

1) Simply say "Alexa, open Louisiana Police Scanner", and the currently most listened to scanner in Louisiana will be played. 

2) If you want to listen to another scanner say "Alexa, ask Louisiana Police Scanner to lookup scanner". And you will be prompted for a zip code for the location of the scanner you want to listen to.

Note, Louisiana zip codes are in the range of 70001- 71497.

3) You will then be asked which scanner type, Police, Fire, EMS, Rail or Airport, you would like to listen. Respond, "Alexa, 'scanner type'.

4) Next, a numbered list of scanners names based on the zip code and scanner type will be provided. To choose a scanner, Respond, "Alexa option 'option number'". And the selected live scanner will be streamed. 

To pause or stop a streaming scanner, say "Alexa, Pause", or "Alexa, Stop", This will stop the currently playing scanner. To resume playing, say "Alexa, resume" or "Alexa, play".

Note some scanners depending on time of day and activity a quiet for periods of time.


A popular scanner is zip code 70114, Police scanner selecting option number corresponding to " New Orleans Police" scanner.

A video showing how this police scanner works is located (This is for Texas Police scanner, but Ohio Police Scanner works the same)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0-OErAUeQlw&t=56s

If you enjoy Louisiana Police Scanner, please check out other Police scanner skills: Texas Police Scanner, California Police Scanner and Florida Police Scanner
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
